Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory139.png'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0.8', 4: '0.8', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'The sandstorm covering the sky rules over the wild land, hiding even the night behind its veil.'}
{3: 'Leaning outside the cave, Noctis has nothing to do on his watch. He dusts off the sand on him before heading back inside the cave.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory37.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'What is it? Is something wrong?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "Nah. I'm just tired of standing outside like a lamppost.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'You can count cacti.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "Can't see shit through this sandstorm.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noctis scratches his head and turns toward where Beardy is supposed to be restingâ€”'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Eh? Where did he go?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The corner they save for Beardy in the cave is empty except for the motorcycle he drives.'}
{3: 'Neither Beardy nor the projector he always has with him is there.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: "There's a note under the rock.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'It says... "Someone stole my films in the middle of the night. I\'m going after them."', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Vera takes the note from No. 21. There is indeed nothing but a hastily written line on the stained paper.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Did we lose anything important? Let's make sure.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "We don't have anything but our weapons and equipment. What can we possibly lose?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Why would there be thieves in this weather? Can you smell anyone else, No. 21?', 4: '3'}
{3: 'No. 21 spins around before shaking her head.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "It's too dusty outside. My smell module isn't working very well.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "I can't smell anyone else. I... can't even smell where Beardy went.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "He's going to kill himself, leaving in this weather.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "We'll wait, then. We have no idea where he went to find his stuff.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Those were his belongings, anyway... I told him Cerberus won't slow down or stop for anyone.", 4: '3'}
{3: 'Vera puts the note back in the corner where Beardy was resting under a rock.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "...He hasn't told us how the movie ended yet.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "It's just a movie... We'll find someone from WGAA to look up its file for you when we're back on Babylonia.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "How can you inherit someone else's things when you so easily throw your life away...", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Vera turns around and stops talking.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "But Noctis said he'd make a movie with Beardy.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Bullshit. I never said that.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: '"They\'re movies! Even I can make them! Find me if you\'re making one next time. It\'ll be so much better than this crappy B-movie."', 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 does an impression of Noctis and repeats what he said half a day ago.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Did I say that? I don't remember...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'You were drinking with Beardy.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Alcohol makes you stupid, Noctis.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Oh... I might have said it, then.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Noctis touches his chin contemplatively, seemingly trying very hard to recall what he said.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Well... if I said that, it's a promise.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "It doesn't feel right to let him die, then. I'll go look for him.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Noctis nods before immediately marching toward the entrance of the cave, ready to leave and search for him.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Who let you act without authorization?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "What now? I'm just trying to find a guy.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "The mission deadline is still a while away, right? We don't have much to do with this sandstorm out there anyway.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Captain... is hesitant.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Why would I be hesitant about some unrelated human?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Well, I suppose we can tell Murray about it afterward.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Someone stole something under our watch, and we did nothing about it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Bullshit. Weren't you keeping watch?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Weren't you and 21 inside the cave?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I hate people who carry other people's wishes without knowing their weight.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Sounds like you should find him and punch him in the face.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera glares at Noctis and No. 21, and she sighs.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'This idiot... was probably heading northeast.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'You saw him?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'I happened to see him sneak out.', 4: '3'}
{3: "No. 21 tugs Vera's sleeve."}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "I'll go look for him with you, Captain. Noctis will go, too.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Hey! Why am I moving alone?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'You were the one who suggested we look for him in the first place.', 4: '3'}
{3: 'Vera grabs her banner spear. The sandstorm rages on, and the banner flutters in the air.'}
